body: The last sentence makes it somewhat clear what's going on. I focused on the first couple sentences, in which TODO really does read like a placeholder. Perhaps mentioning static analysis in the first sentence would make a quick reading clearer. I think it's also the casing, since it's arguably atypical and un-idiomatic (I would expect ToDo; it's not an initialism). But I can understand why it's spelled like that, in this case.
